traits.name: Goal-Oriented
traits.action: Set SMART goals for a community project using SMM’s progress tracker.

traits.name: Strength
traits.description: Enhances mental resilience for public roles.
traits.action: Practice daily yoga to build mental fortitude, guided by SMM wellness sessions.

traits.name: Accurate
traits.action: Use SMM’s focus-enhancing neurofeedback to improve accuracy in data tasks.

traits.name: Logical Reasoning
traits.action: Solve policy logic puzzles daily to sharpen reasoning skills.

traits.name: Spatially Aware
traits.description: Helps visualize urban or logistical plans.
traits.action: Practice interpreting city planning maps with online tools.

traits.name: Dexterity
traits.action: Practice manual tasks like emergency response drills.

traits.name: Athletic
traits.description: Boosts stamina for fieldwork or law enforcement.
traits.action: Join a fitness program to improve physical endurance.

traits.name: Melodic
traits.action: Practice vocal exercises to develop a clear public speaking tone.

traits.name: Artistic Sensitivity
traits.action: Create public service infographics using design software like Canva.
